title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models with simple synchronous & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval and tool-calling workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama servers; chat history, model management, multimodal, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation memory, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code completion, explanations and refactoring suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list models with builder-style API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate and manage models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection helpers and minimal API sample.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (cpu/cuda/rocm) and compose stacks for running Ollama in containers with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for human-task summarisation or decision assistance.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy support for Ollama, letting you call local models via OpenAI-compatible endpoints with cost tracking and load balancing.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama chat responses into channels or DMs with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels via mentions or shortcuts with thread-aware context.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat or generate endpoints inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-homeassistant
summary: Custom Home Assistant integration exposing Ollama as a conversation agent for local, private voice or text automations.
